short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Property Extra browser extension provides listing price history. Currently compatible with rightmove.co.uk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Property Extra browser extension enhances property listing websites by adding property listing price history to search results. Users can also like/dislike properties and add notes - all accessible from the extension's icon in the browser
